name: AB SPECIALITY SILICONE
description: Manufacturer and Distributor specializing in silicone chemistry and production
sampleDescriptions: One of the clients products was listed on the 301 China Tariff List--$16 Billion Second Tranche and is applying for an exclusion of the products Harmonized Tariff Schedule from the 301 Tariff List.
Client is seeking Congressional support for an exclusion request from the 301 Tariffs -- Batch 2
